title: Portfolio Website
description: A website to showcase my profile in a more interactive way.

title: FPM Regulatory Watch
description: My internship project at SLIB. An internal AI-powered web application that helps financial institutions to comply with the latest regulations.

title: Melanoma Detection
description: A deep learning project aims to detect melanoma, a type of skin cancer, from a large and unbalanced dataset of images.

title: SpotiC
description: A replica of the famous Spotify. A MERN stack music-streaming web application.

title: Bitcoin Complexity
description: A research project to analyze the evolution of the complexity as long as the difficulty of Bitcoin blockchain using data visualization and Bitcoin API. You can also find my written research paper in the repository.

title: The Energy Market
description: A simulation of the enery market influenced by other factors such as weather and inflation. The main focus was on the asynchronous and parallel programming in Python.
